Describing Relationships

First step in investigating a question about an association

Learning Path

Where we‚Äôve been

  • Visualizing a single variable
  • Screening for potential errors and additional data management
  • Starting to describe our project data

Where we‚Äôre at

  • Ready to visualize and describe associations between multiple variables.

Objectives

Items

Calculate appropriate summary statistics for grouped variables

Create appropriate data visualizations for grouped variables

Describe the relationship between two measures in complete sentences with supporting numbers.
